comments.html: IMHO VLAN interfaces should always be passive because they don't represent real physical paths and just clutter the routing tables. Am I wrong?

comments.html: That's a pretty good starting point. There might be exceptions (there always are), for example, when you're using the same device as a switch and an aggregation router.
